question: Seismic Survey Campaign, which was seen in the news, is launched by which Indian company?
explanation:
Union Petroleum and Natural Gas Minister Dharmendra Pradhan has recently inaugurated the Seismic Survey Campaign by Oil India Limited.
The 220- Crore seismic survey is to be conducted under the Open Acreage Licensing Policy (OALP), through which OIL had earlier won five blocks for hydrocarbon exploration in Odisha. The survey will be undertaken in and around Mahanadi basin in Odisha.
